text: Ara yakhana allaha duâ€™ti dalera ekatira byapare tomadera sathe oyada karechilena ye, seti tomadera hastagata habe, ara tomara kamana karachile yate kona rakama kantaka ne'i, ta'i tomadera bhage asuka; athaca allaha ca'itena satyake sbiya kalamera madhyame satye parinata karate ebam kapheradera mula kartana kare dite
